alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:11PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sanpete...northeastern Millard and southeastern Juab Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 311 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles northeast of Delta, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scipio, Levan, Oak City, Leamington, Lynndyl, Jericho, Mills and Yuba Lake State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 186 and 221. US Route 6 between mile markers 97 and 110, and between mile markers 121 and 122. US Route 50 between mile markers 130 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties
